text: Reynaldo Gaudencio Escobar Pérez is a Mexican politician who was Secretary of Government in the state of Veracruz, and was the state's general attorney, resigned on October 8, 2011. He was also the former mayor of Xalapa...El PAN lamenta pero acata los fallos favorables al PRIArticle section: ¨¿El Rey de los bailarines?¨ ¿Por qué Reynaldo Gaudencio Escobar Pérez debe renunciar?Procurador de Justicia de Veracruz presenta renunciaCae procurador de Veracruz por escalada de ejecuciones == See also == * Veracruz state election, 2000 ==References== ==External links== * Reynaldo Escobar Declina a la diputacion * 5 Razones para no elegir a Reynaldo Escobar Pérez Category:Politicians from Veracruz Category:Living people Category:State political office-holders in Mexico Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:21st-century Mexican politicians Category:Mexican prosecutors
title: Reynaldo Escobar Pérez
